nodes.text: Peka was a small and energetic river community on the Outer Rim planet Batuu. The people of Peka were hard-working and family-oriented and centered many of their activities around the nearby river. Many locals lived in makeshift tents, huts, or log cabins, and many citizens traveled an hour away by transport to work in Black Spire Outpost.

Peka was created as part of the backstory for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a theme park land that opened to guests on May 31, 2019 at Disneyland Park, and August 29, 2019 at Disney's Hollywood Studios, Walt Disney World.
